title: Relentless
description: I’m an heiress with a broken past. It should have been the end for me, but now my mortal enemy has become my savior. He hides me away from the world as if he can save me. Lucian Morelli is a billionaire who doesn’t know how to feel anything.Except when he’s with me. Love between a Morelli and a Constantine will never survive. The war between both families turns into an inferno, consuming the entire city of Bishop’s Landing. The world is soaked in blood. No one is left standing, not even the couple who vowed their final breaths. I would sacrifice everything for the man I love, and I just may have to. RELENTLESS is the explosive finale of Jade West's Starcrossed Lovers trilogy set in the world of Midnight Dynasty.
author: Jade West
